senses.description:
indefinite the soul,
        comprehending
        mind, affections and will, or, in connection with certain verbs, having more specific reference to some one of
        them
specific reference to mind (characteristic of לבב)

specific reference to inclinations, resolutions, determinations of the will
        
        (characteristic of ׳
ל)

specific reference to moral character (characteristic of ׳
        
ל)

= the man himself (meaning characteristic of נֶפֶשׁ
        )

specifically of seat of the emotions and passions (for which
        usually
        נפשׁ)
seat of courage (for which usually רוּחַ)
